headline: Mastercard (MA) Strengthens Banking Ties, Maintains Dividends
summary: Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA) is one of Goldman Sachs’s top growth stock picks. On February 12, Mastercard Incorporated’s (NYSE:MA) open finance technology became the backbone of Truist Financial’s first-ever open banking platform. Truist will use Mastercard’s open finance API network to replace the risky practice of credential-sharing with tokenized, permissioned API connections. The technology acts as […]

headline: A Viral Blog Post Slams Stocks. Fear About AI Is Real.
summary: The Substack post envisions an economy in 2028 in which AI has triggered mass layoffs and disrupted large-cap stocks like DoorDash and Uber.

headline: Financial Stocks Take a Hit With AI Worries on Investors’ Minds
summary: Shares in big banks and other financial services firms took a hit on Monday with investors parsing through the possible impacts of artificial intelligence on the payment processing fees that bring in billions of dollars to the industry every year.  American Express’ stock was down over 7% as of Monday afternoon while JPMorgan, Citigroup and Morgan Stanley were all down 4% or more.  Investors were particularly focused on a report from Citrini Research that predicted an economic calamity based on the widespread proliferation of artificial intelligence into the economy.

headline: The Viral Citrini Substack Post That's Sparking New AI Worries on Wall Street
summary: Is AI bullish for the economy, or bearish? Maybe it's so bullish that it becomes bearish. That's the conceit of a viral Substack post from Citrini Research painting a dark portrait of a future scenario in which AI inspires a race to the bottom in white-collar knowledge work.

headline: Mexico Regulators Slam the Brakes on Visa's Prosa Acquisition
summary: V's bid to buy 51% of Mexico's Prosa was blocked by regulators, citing competition and data concerns, adding to global scrutiny worldwide.

headline: Software, Payments Shares Tumble After Citrini Post on AI Risks
summary: DoorDash Inc., American Express Co. and Blackstone Inc all slumped more than 7%.  Shares of other companies name-checked in the article, including Uber Technologies Inc., Mastercard Inc., Visa Inc, Capital One Financial Corp., Apollo Global Management Inc. and KKR & Co. Inc. were all lower by at least 3%.

headline: Is HODLing killing bitcoin adoption?
summary: GoMining CEO, Mark Zalan, joined CoinDesk Live at Consensus Hong Kong to challenge bitcoin's "digital gold" narrative. Zalan explains why Bitcoin must evolve from a stagnant investment into a functional currency to achieve true mass adoption. He breaks down the infrastructure hurdles preventing everyday spending and how GoMining’s 2026 rollout of new payment rails aims to outperform legacy giants like Visa and MasterCard.

headline: Dystopian AI report sinks DoorDash, software stocks
summary: Investing.com -- DoorDash shares fell 7% on Monday, while Uber dropped 3%, Salesforce declined 4%, MongoDB slid 6%, and ServiceNow lost 4%, following publication of a dystopian scenario analysis from Citirini Research examining potential risks from rapid AI advancement. Visa and Mastercard also declined, falling over 2%.
